QuestData.Title: Sunfury Briefings
QuestData.Description: Something about these manaforges has been bothering me, $n. Naaru technology is incredibly advanced; it should've taken Kael'thas years to even begin to understand it.$B$BInformation-gathering on the subject has been difficult as Kael's army is well disciplined and destroys all evidence of written communication.$B$BWe've been informed Manaforge Duro is under attack by mana creatures. It is possible that those defending it have not yet destroyed their briefings. Obtain them and bring them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Manaforge Duro and retrieve the Sunfury Military Briefing and the Sunfury Arcane Briefing from the Sunfury units stationed there. Return to Exarch Orellis when you've completed this task.$B$BCompleting quests for the Aldor will cause your Scryers reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you have any luck with the briefings from Manaforge Duro?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent job, $N! Let us see what can be learned from these briefings.
